tidbits.title: Biodiversity Hotspot
tidbits.description: Guinea-Bissau is a biodiversity hotspot, boasting diverse ecosystems, mangrove swamps, and national parks that support rich wildlife.

tidbits.title: Cultural Melting Pot
tidbits.description: The country is a cultural melting pot, with various ethnic groups contributing to its cultural mosaic, seen in music, dance, and traditional ceremonies.

tidbits.title: Colonial Heritage
tidbits.description: Colonial influences from Portuguese rule are evident in Guinea-Bissau's architecture, language, and customs, reflecting its historical past.
